961830.name: In Memory Official Extended Soundtrack
961830.description:
Re-experience the story of In Memory through this official extended soundtrack.
These are not just the sound files and music from the game, but completely
remixed to offer an immersive, ambient audio journey for you to enjoy.

We've also added the soundtrack in .FLAC for the highest quality listening experience.

Track list:

1. Specks in the dark
2. Cherished
3. Departure
4. Below The Waves
5. Broken Town
6. Remembering
7. In Memory
961830.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
